install.name: Eloqua Contact Push
install.author: Agape Red
install.description: The Eloqua Contact Push plugin sends registration data to the Eloqua API when users register on the Joomla site.

param.name: username
param.label: Eloqua Username
param.description: The Eloqua username to be associated with the API.

param.name: password
param.label: Eloqua Password
param.description: The password for the Eloqua API account.

param.name: endpoint
param.label: Eloqua API Endpoint
param.description: The API Endpoint URL for Eloqua.
